title: Current Prices Paid; Percent of Respondents Reporting Increases for Federal Reserve District 3: Philadelphia
notes: Current Prices Paid reports the change in prices paid compared to the previous month for reporting service firms. For more information about this release from the Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia, visit here. (https://www.philadelphiafed.org/research-and-data/regional-economy/nonmanufacturing-business-outlook-survey/)
